replies.body: "soon to be nerfed after enough money is made current meta pick bundle"

> [{quoted}](name=Worst Mid Ever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=c1EGqit6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-25T07:18:33.855+0000)
>
> "soon to be nerfed after enough money is made current meta pick bundle"

What are the changes for her? She's honestly the only ADC that I enjoy playing, besides Kalista, I love her entire kit design, if they change it then idk I want refunds.

next patch

* Super Mega Death Rocket (R) minimum damage decreased to 25/35/45 from 125/175/225
* Super Mega Death Rocket (R) minimum AD ratio reduced to .1 bonus AD from .5  bonus AD'

more nerfs after that probably, she has been ~55% winrate for the past year in plat+ which is disgusting for a popular adc

its justified...point blank ults shouldnt do a shit ton of damage...its meant to be a long range ult.

its like ashe stun on ult. not great at point blank.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=c1EGqit6,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-25T08:25:59.629+0000)
>
> its justified...point blank ults shouldnt do a shit ton of damage...its meant to be a long range ult.
> 
> its like ashe stun on ult. not great at point blank.

The difference is Ashe's and Ezreal's ults don't do 50 damage at face value, Ashe's still stuns you for a second and Ezreal's does more damage the closer you are because it doesn't lose damage percentage. Yes, Jinx is popular and one of the few best ADC's in the game, but her power comes from her siege potential, Jinx top will shred the top laner instantly and have all three of their towers down before 15 minutes. Making her ult do that little damage is a kick in the face, seeing as 9/10 her ult doesn't even go off as it has an animation that takes fucking hours to complete.
sorry cant hear you over draven half healthing scrubs with his ult

Maximum Physical Damage (two hits): 350 / 550 / 750 (+ 220% bonus AD) 

    Maximum Physical Damage: 250 / 350 / 450 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of enemies' missing health)

thing is, draven needs to hit with both sides....jinx only needs around the range of her ZAP! for her max damage and what? 1500 missing HP for hers to start outscaling his.

still, his is deceptively strong...when i used to play draven it never really seemed like a huge damage hit...but thats quite nice. still, not exactly easy to hit twice even at point blank range. where jinx ult is being nerfed. anything past her AA range when normal (500? 525?) and its already doing the same damage as before...

we're talking about ulting at point blank..... max range means nothing, and draven can just double tap r to get two hits with his ult, reducing jinxs ult to a pitiful 25 damage at rank 1? {{item:31.....

Her Ult will do fuk all damage at point blank range now but does the same amount of damage at max range.

Just FYI, max damage of jinx ult is once it goes past her Zap range apparently. So not that bad, just the little skirmishes where she wins by like 100hp she might lose now.

She has the highest pick rate and win rate of any ADC in solo que, so Riot feel they have to do something.
If this is short range adc's, why don't they have Maokai?
Whats the point I'm shit at adc ……………………. But i still have skins for every single one -.-

Also, just FYI Jinx's range is shorter than Draven, Corki, Kalista, Ezreal, Tristana, MF, Twitch and Vayne.

Granted her level 5 Q has the longest AA range in the game but it costs mana.
(when I say AA, i mean a normal AA, I KNOW that Twitch's Ult and Kog's level 5 W has longer range but they "run out" and Rockets dont (except for mana)).

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=c1EGqit6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-25T09:14:00.761+0000)
>
> Also, just FYI Jinx's range is shorter than Draven, Corki, Kalista, Ezreal, Tristana, MF, Twitch and Vayne.
> 
> Granted her level 5 Q has the longest AA range in the game but it costs mana.
> (when I say AA, i mean a normal AA, I KNOW that Twitch's Ult and Kog's level 5 W has longer range but they "run out" and Rockets dont (except for mana)).

Theirs more than just AA range that decided whether they're short, medium or long ranged, Jinx's kit screams middle-long, her abilities cause her to have long range, however at the same time she's effective at medium range. Kalista is short-medium, Draven is short-medium, Tristina is all depending on the period of the match.

Jinx is far from short-medium ranged, if the ability effects her range, then it effects her overall range group.
